questions.question_text: je brahmarūp thayo tene ja shāno adhikār chhe?
questions.explanation: Vach.Lo.7 je brahmarūp thayo tene ja Purushottamnī bhaktino adhikār chhe.

questions.question_text: je Bhagwānnā pratāpne vichārīne ......... kare chhe, te to potānā swarūpne atishay ujjval prakāshmān jue chhe.
questions.explanation: Vach.Ga.Pa.20 je Bhagwānnā pratāpne vichārīne antardrashți kare chhe, te to potānā swarūpne atishay ujjval prakāshmān jue chhe

questions.question_text: potānā jīvātmāne e brahma sangathe ekatā karīne shānī Swāmī-sevakbhāve upāsanā karavī.
questions.explanation: potānā jīvātmāne e brahma sangathe ekatā karīne Parabrahmanī Swāmī-sevakbhāve upāsanā karavī.

questions.question_text: Jem Bhagwānnī mānasī pūjā kare tem ja je uttam haribhakta hoy tenī pan Bhagwānnī ......... karīne Bhagwan bheļī mānasī pūjā kare.
questions.explanation: Jem Bhagwānnī mānasī pūjā kare tem ja je uttam haribhakta hoy tenī pan Bhagwānnī prasādīe karīne Bhagwan bheļī mānasī pūjā kare

questions.question_text: Mārī asht prakārnī je pratimā tathā je ......... tene vishe hu akhand nivās karīne rahu chhu.
questions.explanation: Mārī asht prakārnī je pratimā tathā je sant tene vishe hu akhand nivās karīne rahu chhu.

questions.question_text: Bhagwān ne Bhagwānnā sant e ja ......... chhe.
questions.explanation: Bhagwān ne Bhagwānnā sant e ja kalyāņkārī chhe

questions.question_text: Bhagwān ke Bhagwānnā santnī jyāre prāpti thaï tyāre e jīvne ethī uparānt bīju koī ......... nathī, e ja param kalyān chhe.
questions.explanation: Bhagwān ke Bhagwānnā santnī jyāre prāpti thaï tyāre e jīvne ethī uparānt bīju koī kalyāņ nathī, e ja param kalyān chhe.

questions.question_text: jene potānu kalyāņ ichchhavu tene to Bhagwān ne Bhagwānnā ......... ethī uparānt bīju kāī jagatmā sukhdāyī nathī.
questions.explanation: jene potānu kalyāņ ichchhavu tene to Bhagwān ne Bhagwānnā sādhu ethī uparānt bīju kāī jagatmā sukhdāyī nathī.

questions.question_text: Sant hu ne hu te vaļi ......... re, Em Shrimukhe kahe Bhagwant re
questions.explanation: Sant hu ne hu te vaļi sant re, Em Shrimukhe kahe Bhagwant re

questions.question_text: Sant mānajo māri ......... re, Emā fer nathi ek rati re...
questions.explanation: Sant mānajo māri murati re, Emā fer nathi ek rati re...
